description: Manage user accounts for a VM.

commands.name: az vm user delete
commands.summary: Delete a user account from a VM.
examples: az vm user delete -u username -n MyVm -g MyResourceGroup
az vm user delete -u username --ids $(az vm list -g MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv)

commands.name: az vm user reset-ssh
commands.summary: Reset the SSH configuration on a VM.
examples: az vm user reset-ssh -n MyVm -g MyResourceGroup
az vm user reset-ssh --ids $(az vm list -g MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv)

commands.name: az vm user update
commands.summary: Update a user account for VM. You can use it to update password or ssh key value for VM user.
examples: az vm user update -u username -p password -n MyVm -g MyResourceGroup
az vm user update -u username --ssh-key-value "$(< ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub)" -n MyVm -g MyResourceGroup
az vm user update -u username --ssh-key-value "$(< ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub)" --ids $(az vm list -g MyResourceGroup --query "[].id" -o tsv)
